A

actualDamage - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackReport
Contains the damage received from an attack, can be a negative value (healing).
attack() - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.BlueDragon
attack() method is overrided by the class BlueDragon, it will return subclass of the class Attack, in this case, there are 80% chances to return MagicAttack's object, and 20% to return FrostAttack; both MagicAttack and FrostAttack will set the damage value as 4*D12;
attack() - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Character
This method generates an Attack from this character, it uses strength + (1 to 8 inclusive) for the damage calculation.
attack() - Method in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.RedDragon
attack() method is overrided by the class RedDragon, it will return subclass of the class Attack, in this case, there are 70% chances to return MagicAttack's object, and 30% to return FireAttack; both MagicAttack's and FireAttack's damages are: 3 * D20,
Attack - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model
This class represents an Attack a character generates and contains a damage score.
Attack() - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Attack
This constructor sets the damage to zero (i.e.
Attack(int) - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Attack
This constructor sets the value specified into the damage field, no data validation is performed.
attackName - Variable in class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackOptional
add field as "attackName", which could be set value as "frostAttack", "magicAttack" or "fireAttack" when being initialized.
AttackOptional - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model
The class 'AttackOptional' is built only for the Optional Bonus Question in Assignment2, showing the possibility to replace subclass ('FireAttack' and 'FrostAttack') by using instance 'fields' (attackName) in the superclass (which is the class 'Attack' originally).
AttackOptional() - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackOptional
non-parameter constructor, set the default value of attackName as "magicAttack"
AttackOptional(int, String) - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackOptional
add 1 String parameter to set the value of attackName;
AttackReport - Class in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model
This class contains two pieces of information, the first is a text-based description of how a character defended against an attack, the second is the actualDamage the character received, note that actualDamage could have a negative value indicating healing.
AttackReport() - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackReport
Sets the report to "no report" and the actual damage to zero (i.e.
AttackReport(String, int) - Constructor for class com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.AttackReport
Sets the report and actualDamage to the respective fields.
